definition: of or providing nourishment, any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue
details:
adjective
- of or providing nourishment
= synonyms: alimental
noun
- any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue
= synonyms: food
- any substance (such as a chemical element or inorganic compound) that can be taken in by a green plant and used in organic synthesis
